id: # Maps planet type to TASC planet type
# Can also map specific conditions to TASC planet types
# Anything not matched here maps to unknown
# id is the planet's type ID as returned from PlanetAPI.getTypeID()
# conditions is a | separated list of conditions that map to a planet type
# terraforming_type_id is the type of planet this should be treated as by TASC requirements
conditions: ie all planet types that map to barren in this file will satisfy a PlanetTypeRequirement with "barren" as the data

id: # terraforming_possible is whether this planet type can be terraformed
# base_water_level is the water level that the MarketHasWaterPresent requirement type will use
# conditional_water_requirements is a | separated list of 'requirement_id ; water_level' pairs with requirement_id being one of the IDs from 'terraforming_requirements.csv'. If the requirement is met
conditions: the paired water level will be used instead of base_water_level
